channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Graph app permission
item.description:
Id: a6325ae7-2b73-4dbd-abed-fbeacfbf8696
Display name: Policy.ReadWrite.CrossTenantCapability
Description: Read and write your organization's M365 cross tenant access capabilities
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/a6325ae7-2b73-4dbd-abed-fbeacfbf8696

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 93629c8c-5d36-4533-85cd-f5bb3338710e
Display name: Entra Connect Health Service Admin
Description: Can set up and manage Microsoft Entra Connect Health. Includes agent set up and managing services on the Azure portal
Link: https://management.azure.com/93629c8c-5d36-4533-85cd-f5bb3338710e?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: e47c6f54-e4a2-4754-9501-8e0985b135e1
Display name: Azure AI Account Owner
Description: Grants full access to manage AI projects and accounts. Grants conditional assignment of the Azure AI User role to other user principles.
Link: https://management.azure.com/e47c6f54-e4a2-4754-9501-8e0985b135e1?api-version=2022-04-01
